job.title: Software Integration Engineer
job.description: <p>We are looking for a Software Integration Engineer in the Houston, TX area. This is a full time position onsite that includes great benefits including health, dental, vision, 401K, PTO and an annual bonus.</p><p><br></p><p>This position will be working with the backend of several applications including the ServiceNow platform. As a Software Integration Engineer, your main responsibilities consists of communicating with various departments and understanding what needs to be done in developing solutions for various enterprise software systems.</p><p><br></p><p>Technical Requirements:</p><ul><li>Software development background in .NET</li><li>Containerization experience with Docker and Kubernetes</li><li>Experience developing applications in high availability clusters getting to ensure that they are cloud ready</li><li>Experience integrating various applications with the ServiceNow platform</li><li>Automation experience with Ansible and Terraform</li><li>Experience communicating with users to gather their requirements</li></ul>
